document.docAuthor: Liu, Zhen, He, Jun-Hua, Chen, Xue-Xin & Gupta, Ankita
document.masterDocTitle: The ater-group of the genus Apanteles Foerster (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae) from China with the descriptions of forty-eight new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The ater-group of the genus Apanteles Foerster (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae) from China with the descriptions of forty-eight new species

subSubSection.paragraph: Diagnosis. Body length 3.5 mm , fore wing length 3.3 mm . Body black, hind femur reddish brown. Ocelli large, posterior tangent to anterior ocellus transecting posterior ocelli, distance between fore and hind ocellus slightly shorter than diameter of hind ocellus. Antenna distinctly longer than body length, penultimate flagellomere slightly longer than wide. Interspaces between punctures on disc of mesonotum slightly larger than its diameter on pronotum. Areola on propodeum V-shaped apically, closed with weak costulae, posterio-lateral parts smooth. Pterostigma 2.3× as long as its widest part, vein 1-R1 1.3× longer than pterostigma, vein r 2.2× longer than vein 2-SR, distinctly angled at junction. T1 gradually constricted towards apex, 2.2× longer than hind width, turned-over part slightly shiny, weakly rugose-punctate laterally, longitudinal channel shallow and broad; T2 shiny and nearly polished, except a few weak punctures, 4.4× wider than long in the middle; T3 2.4× longer than T2. Ovipositor sheath not distinctly longer than hind tibia.

Hosts. According to the label,
Apis cerana Fabricius. According
to the literature,
Achroia grisella (Fabricius)
,
A. grisella (Fabricius)
[bees wax],
Achroia innotata (Walker)
,
Galleria mellonella
(L.),
G. mellonella
(L.) [bees wax] and
Vitula edmandsii (Packard) (
Yu et al . 2016
)
.

Fujian
,

, Chen Xuexin , No. 942289
;

Guangdong
,

, Chen Jujian , No. 20048914
;

Guangxi
,

, Yan Chengjin , Nos. 201100835, 201100839
;

Guizhou
, 1979, Mou Yangqiu , No. 801039, ex

;

1000m
), Mt. Leigong , Guizhou ,

, Zhang Hongying , No. 200605685
;

,

, Wang Manman , No. 200805953
;

2008.XI.24
, Tan Jiangli , No. 200806064
;
2♀♀ , Xunwu ,
Jiangxi
,
1974.VIII.20
, Jiangxi Bee Institute , No. 760383, ex
Apis cerana Fabricius
;
1♀ , Baishanzu (
1856m
), Qingyuan ,
Zhejiang
,
2003.VIII.13
, Wu Qiong, No. 20058622
;
1♀ , Mt. Gutian , Kaihua , Zhejiang , 1992.VII–VIII, Ma Yun, No. 905786
;
1♀ , ditto,
1992.X.29
, Wu Hong , No. 949248
.

Distribution. China ( Fujian , Guangdong , Guangxi , Guizhou , Hainan , Hunan , Jiangxi , Taiwan , Zhejiang); Argentina , Armenia , Bulgaria , France , Hungary , India , Italy , Japan , Mauritius , New Zealand , Pakistan , Spain , Turkey , U.S. A, UK .
Remarks. Characters of the examined specimens mostly agree with the published descriptions and the type specimen except areola V-shaped, not U-shaped apically.
